Actions.Name: Soul Flay
Actions.Description: A foe in range must sacrifice 2, once for every one of its adjacent allies, then is pacified.

Actions.Name: Soul Shred
Actions.Description: Mark a foe in range. While marked, that foe gains Aura 2. Foes that end their turn in the aura must sacrifice 2. A foe can save to end this mark if they end their turn with no allies in the aura.
